title: Oscars 2017: Who will win, should win, and should have been nominated
text:
Clockwise from top left: “La La Land,” “Hidden Figures,” “Hell or High Water” and “Moonlight.” (Clockwise from top left: Dale Robinette/Lionsgate; Hopper Stone/SMPSP/Twentieth Century Fox; Lorey Sebastian/CBS Films; David Bornfriend/A24) The Washington Post’s three film critics have picked who will win the major Oscars, who should win and who should have been nominated:

“Moonlight”

Ann Hornaday: “La La Land”
Michael O’Sullivan: “La La Land”
Stephanie Merry: “La La Land”
Should win:

M.O.: “Hell or High Water”
S.M.: “Moonlight”
Should have been nominated:
A.H.: “Loving”
M.O.: “20th Century Women”
S.M.: “Jackie”
